content: *this triangle shawl is lacy and stylish lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 601 *chs-shal pdf* skill level intermediate homespun® article #790 5 balls crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm gauge each pattern repeat measures about 5 inches across worked in 35-row pattern spanish translation done with permission can be found here 1 translated by gaveta 1 http //knittingandcrocheting-club blogspot com es/2013/06/lion-brands-elegant-shawl-espanol html
